alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 8:13AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nance, northeastern Hamilton, northwestern Merrick and northeastern Howard Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 813 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cushing, or 25 miles north of Grand Island, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Palmer around 820 AM CDT. Archer around 825 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Central City, Clarks and Hordville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
